description: Bridges: Method delete must have `public function delete<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CollectionDeleteCriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionResponseTransfer;` signature. https://spryker.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CORE/pages/478052552/Application+Namespace+Conventions#ApplicationNamespaceConventions-Facade
Bridges: Type should be defined for param `keyName` in method `Spryker\Zed\CompanyRoleGui\Dependency\Facade\CompanyRoleGuiToGlossaryFacadeBridge::translate()`.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `translate()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
